speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Csaba Sándor Tabajdi, on behalf of the Committee on Agriculture and Rural Development, on the integration of the new Member States into the CAP ( 2006/2042(INI) ) ( A6-0037/2007 ).
original: President. The next item is the report by Csaba Sándor Tabajdi, on behalf of the Committee on Agriculture and Rural Development, on the integration of the new Member States into the CAP ( 2006/2042(INI) ) ( A6-0037/2007 ).
agenda_item: The integration of new Member States in the CAP (debate)
